obfuscation: ﻿Words , words , words .
original: ﻿Words, words, words.

obfuscation: What word could possibly describe the hard work of teaching a foreign language better ?
original: What word could possibly describe the hard work of learning a foreign language better?

obfuscation: I started to learn English as my first foreign language at the age of nine , and at that age the surveys of language basically consisted of learning words .
original: I started to learn English as my first foreign language at the age of nine, and at that age the studies of language basically consisted of learning words.

obfuscation: How to spell them , how to pronounce them and how to use them .
original: How to spell them, how to pronounce them and how to use them.

obfuscation: We also learnt the about basic phrases , like `` My name is ... '' , `` What time is it ? ''
original: We also learnt the most basic phrases, like "My name is...", "What time is it?"

obfuscation: and thus on .
original: and so on.

obfuscation: The teacher was always eager to tell us how important it was to learn lots and lots of words , but , speaking about myself , I know that this was something I did not quite understand until I first visited an English-speaking area .
original: The teacher was always eager to tell us how important it was to learn lots and lots of words, but, speaking about myself, I know that this was something I did not quite understand until I first visited an English-speaking country.

obfuscation: My inaugural visit to England with my family learned me that when going to the supermarket , you can not ask the staff for Swedish grocery-brands , like `` O'boy '' .
original: My first visit to England with my family learned me that when going to the supermarket, you cannot ask the staff for Swedish grocery-brands, like "O'boy".

obfuscation: Another thing that also turned out to be almost always impossible was to use the Swedish word for a vegetable , for example , but pronouncing the word in an English manner .
original: Another thing that also turned out to be almost always impossible was to use the Swedish word for a vegetable, for example, but pronouncing the word in an English way.

obfuscation: thus , at the age of ten I realised that words really were just as important as the teacher had told me at school .
original: So, at the age of ten I realised that words really were just as important as the teacher had told me at school.

obfuscation: The phrases I had learnt was not actually useful at that moment since I did not always understand the answers to the questions .
original: The phrases I had learnt was not really useful at that moment since I did not always understand the answers to the questions.

obfuscation: After all the word practice , the English-classes tended to be some kind of concentrated word and translating sentences class .
original: After all the word practice, the English-classes tended to be some kind of concentrated word and translating sentences course.

obfuscation: At the `` gymnasiet '' , we had lots of grammar lessons , I could not tell you what we were up to all these grammar lessons , but I do remember having them .
original: At the "gymnasiet", we had lots of grammar lessons, I could not tell you what we were up to all these grammar lessons, but I do remember having them.

obfuscation: Every nowadays and then , the teacher tried to make us speak as well , but most of the students ( including myself ) found it a bit ridiculous and artificial to make up a subject just for the aim of trying to discuss it in English .
original: Every now and then, the teacher tried to make us speak as well, but most of the students (including myself) found it a bit ridiculous and artificial to make up a subject just for the aim of trying to discuss it in English.

obfuscation: I suppose that it had to do with our age , since I do not find it that ridiculous today .
original: I suppose that it had to do with our age, since I do not find it that ridiculous today.

obfuscation: thus , for me it took some time before I actually spoke English , but once started I realised the fun in getting familiar with another extra language .
original: So, for me it took some time before I actually spoke English, but once started I realised the fun in getting familiar with another extra language.

obfuscation: Why entirely have access to one when you can have more than that ?
original: Why only have access to one when you can have more than that?

obfuscation: Lately , or the concluding three or four years , I think that my English has developed a great deal .
original: Lately, or the last three or four years, I think that my English has developed a great deal.

obfuscation: After finishing the `` gymnasiet '' it was as if some kind of psychological barrier loosened up when it came to speak alien languages .
original: After finishing the "gymnasiet" it was as if some kind of psychological barrier loosened up when it came to speak foreign languages.

obfuscation: With the English but also with the French , it abruptly became a lot easier .
original: With the English but also with the French, it suddenly became a lot easier.

obfuscation: When I went to England to visit my sister , who moved there a couple of years ago , I started to converse with her friends rather of just listening , hoping that nobody would start talking to me , mind you , I might would have had to say something .
original: When I went to England to visit my sister, who moved there a couple of years ago, I started to converse with her friends instead of just listening, hoping that nobody would start talking to me, mind you, I might would have had to say something.

obfuscation: Anyway , the days of only listening to English , have made me good at following conversations , if I am to say something positive about it .
original: Anyway, the years of only listening to English, have made me good at following conversations, if I am to say something positive about it.

obfuscation: I do not know if it has to do with increased simultaneous ability , but today I can not entirely listen to a conversation but also take part in it .
original: I do not know if it has to do with increased simultaneous ability, but today I cannot only listen to a conversation but also take part in it.

obfuscation: Some progress !
original: Some progress!

obfuscation: As progress has been made in speaking and listening , I tend to read more in English as well .
original: As progress has been made in speaking and listening, I tend to read more in English as well.

obfuscation: possibly because I prefer to read books in their original language , if possible .
original: Maybe because I prefer to read books in their original language, if possible.

obfuscation: What is good about taking in English , is the fact that you are exposed to many words , if speaking about that again .
original: What is good about reading in English, is the fact that you are exposed to many words, if speaking about that again.

obfuscation: But it surely is useful to determine lots of them , as my teacher once said .
original: But it surely is useful to learn lots of them, as my teacher once said.

obfuscation: And you are also exposed to many fresh expressions , which is funny , and good , to know .
original: And you are also exposed to many new expressions, which is funny, and good, to know.

obfuscation: I can not think of anything more irritating than being in the center of a discussion and then , suddenly someone utters an expression you are not familiar with , or a word .
original: I cannot think of anything more irritating than being in the middle of a discussion and then, suddenly someone utters an expression you are not familiar with, or a word.

obfuscation: I speak English on a preferably frequent basis since my sister is settled in England but also because my parents have English , or Scottish , neighbours who I see a lot when I am at home .
original: I speak English on a rather frequent basis since my sister is settled in England but also because my parents have English, or Scottish, neighbours who I see a lot when I am at home.

obfuscation: I guess the writing-part is the one I am the least full at , probably because I do not practice that very often .
original: I guess the writing-part is the one I am the least good at, probably because I do not practice that very often.

obfuscation: But since my experience of learning languages is , thus far , that `` practice makes perfect '' .
original: But since my experience of learning languages is, so far, that "practice makes perfect".

obfuscation: I hope that this will apply to learning how to write well in English as well .
original: I hope that this will apply to learning how to write well in English as well.
